body_html: Hi @shkarupa-alex, we have published a guide at https://github.com/tensorflow/custom-op. It's mostly for linux, but macos shouldn't be too far off. If you have any question or anything to add from your experience building ops, feel free to open an issue or pull request. I'm closing this issue for now. Thanks!
